channel.title: Ventrilo For Runescape Talk!
channel.description:
Talk about runescape on the new Ventrilo PLEASE NOTE THIS IS THE UNOFFICIAL VENTRILO FOR RUNESCAPE!
1. Download Ventrilo At [url=http://ventrilo.com/download.php]http://ventrilo.com/download.php[/url] It's Available for both Mac & PC :)
2. Then Create any Username of you're choice.
3. Then for the ip and port you put in the following...
IP Address: 64.237.62.226 Port: 4830
This is Not a RSPS This is for ventrilo ip and port and this ventrilo is used for Runescape Talk ONLY.

item.title: Ventrilo For Runescape Talk!
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:11, topic:349934”][quote author=adog17x link=topic=446307.msg3277441#msg3277441 date=1279639783]
How about an admin make a ventrilo so if he owns it, he can’t get our ip’s
[/quote]

What makes you think it matters if anyone ‘gets your IP’? It means nothing.[/quote]

So if i released a lot of peoples IP address, it wouldn’t be a problem right?
Edit: i also know they can’t do much but still. lold.

Read full topic

item.title: Ventrilo For Runescape Talk!
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:349934”][quote author=spy man47 link=topic=446307.msg3279374#msg3279374 date=1279764674]

How about an admin make a ventrilo so if he owns it, he can’t get our ip’s

What makes you think it matters if anyone ‘gets your IP’? It means nothing.
[/quote]As in trying to connect to our computer.

Hack you, Keylogger… With a small word FUCK YOU UP!

No one can hack you or keylog your computer with your IP. It’s impossible, you would have to download and run a program for that to happen. As I said before, your IP means nothing.[/quote]

ًWell… If you say so…

Read full topic

item.description:

How about an admin make a ventrilo so if he owns it, he can’t get our ip’s

What makes you think it matters if anyone ‘gets your IP’? It means nothing.
[/quote]As in trying to connect to our computer.

Hack you, Keylogger… With a small word FUCK YOU UP![/quote]

No one can hack you or keylog your computer with your IP. It’s impossible, you would have to download and run a program for that to happen. As I said before, your IP means nothing.

Mumble is much better than Ventrilo, plus they have clients for Linux, OSX, Windows, Android, and iPhone. I might even join at some point if you ran it instead.
[/quote]Tis will have to be run like a rsps?[/quote]

I don’t know what you mean by that, its a server, so it will run like ventrilo does.
